t: Alexa Smart Home - Learn about Home Automation | Amazon.com
s: Creating a connected home is easy. Simply plug in and power on your new smart home device. Then say, “Alexa, discover devices.” You can also add devices through the Amazon Alexa app: Open the Alexa app and select Devices. Tap the + icon and select Add Device. Choose the device type and brand.
